The game is thoroughly enjoyable. With recently surpassing 1000 hours and plenty more hours on another platform (XBOX) I can say that the game itself is amazing and has potential to be even better. The developers listens to their community, but its often about unessential things such as cosmetics and artwork rather than balancing issues and events. The events themselves vary. I've had much more fun with the events that include a separate form of currency that you gain from playing rather than the recent events. The developers as of right now seem to be focused on revamping the look of the game rather than focusing on the issues Dead by Daylight currently. Im sure they will be fixed in the future, and have no doubt they will at least be addressed.
I would not recommend to new new players, but for those who are interested in the genre I would totally recommend.
It made me shit my pants first time I played, I recommend this to everyone. Just bring a few roles of toilet paper.
S-Tier

Mar 12 2022, still not enough players for match making to work at all. first time playing a brand new killer and I haven't played killer in 3 months, and I go up against 3 top ranked players and a player who's got more playtime in the last month than I have in the last year. If you're looking to play that one killer, just skip it. Only way this game is getting saved is if they start paying people to play poorly to create the illusion of match making.

I only play with friends once a week and occasionally log in to play as killer, Match making is totally fubar and does not account for play time, so if you play once a week or once a month in the killer's case, you can still go up against people with hundreds of hours in the couple weeks. If you have two great games then your next several games will be much much harder than you'd expect them to be, so you basically chase people around as they have their way with you when you're killer. The game has a really toxic match making system that just gets worse and needs to be abandoned.

Game gets worse with every update. Skill based match making has me somehow running against players of vastly superior skill and knowledge of the game in EVERY match where as it used to only be every OTHER match. combined with the optimum builds of perks that survivors spam the game is quite unimaginative. There are 68 survivor perks but all survivors run the same 3 out of 4 perks and then one other perk to mix it up. There's no incentive not to run the best perks.

There's so few players still playing it, that match making might as well not exist. Constantly being put against players with hundreds if not thousands of hours of play time, with ranks that are much much better than your rank. On top of everything else, half the community is toxic, does nothing but shit on you after the match EVEN IF THEY ESCAPE AND WIN. I wish chat box was disabled like it is on the console version.

Freeze tag simulator is frustrating most times, 7 out of 10 for fun at best times. steep learning curve, much funner with friends in voice chat. There's onlytwo  types of players playing now, experts have been playing a long time and know all mechanics and can easily spot their usage, and sheep who are unfun to play against because they are so easy.

game has lots of unlocks to give the appearance of making progress. There's lots of options to customize your character but some options are obviously not great until you've managed to sink dozens of hours into the game to be able to synergize everything well. Game wasn't fun in the first two hours but I decided to "Give it a few more tries" and now it's cost me 30 bucks that I'll not be able to spend on an actual good game. So now I only play with friends because it's the only cross platform game everyone has right now.

Graphics are straight from 2008, super low res everything, and on top of all that, really long load times for the super low res graphics. There's no options to improve it, you get what you get, a toaster could run this game on max settings.

Maps are made up of 4 objects, rearranged endlessly to create a map that feels disorienting but is only disorienting because literally everything looks the same.
If you want to know what domestic abuse feels like this game will def show you

[b] Вас всех обманывают! Они пишут «нажмите пробел для продолжения» а я всегда клацаю мышкой и все работает.[/b] 

Нормальный такой, асимметричный хорор.  Этакий оксюморон - разнообразное однообразие.  Каждый раз 4 генератора, но каждый раз по разному. Разные живчики, с разными навыками и разным снаряжением. И разные маньяки, опять же, с разными навыками. Все это разное, вкупе, неплохо может разнообразить каждую разную и разнообразную игру. Действительно -  вагон комбинаций и не плохие возможности визуальной кастомизации. [i]А еще мне очень нравятся генераторы внешнего(?) сгорания с составным коленвалом, постепенного зацепа))[/i]

[url= https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2126048868]  
Интересно, что жертвой тут, в некоторых случаях, вполне может оказаться сам маньяк)[/url]  


Шкурки, эвенты, ранги -  тут все есть. В общем вполне себе интересно и азартно :)
[b][u]Хорошая игрушка и поиграть определенно стоит, особенно в компании.[/u][/b]

cool

Ich habe dieses Spiel nun schon einige Runden und Stunden spielen dürfen. Es ist ist leider so, dass es sich bei dem Spiel um ein gutes Spiel handelt. Es gibt jedoch ein großes ABER.
Eine gute Runde ist leider sehr stark davon abhängig, welche Mitspieler man bekommt. Entweder hat man einen Killer, welcher einen nur becamped, sobald man am Haken hängt. Wenn man dann mal einen ordentlichen Killer erwischt hat und dann solo oder duo spielt, dann hat man in der Regel das Pech, dass man keine guten Teammates bekommt. Es ist eine unglaubliche Herausforderungen unter solchen Bedingungen zu speilen. Leider gibt es auch keine Möglichkeit, mit anderen Spielern zu kommunizieren. So kann man sich nicht absprechen und spielt zwangsläufig immer alleine, wenn man solo unterwegs ist.  

Dieses Spiel empfehle ich trotzdem, weil es einfach zu sehr guten und spaßigen Runden kommen kann. Wenn man aber nicht mit fünf Leuten spielt, dann ist es sehr vom Glück abhängig.

Ive played Dead by Daylight for a few years now, was on ps4 now playing on PC. DBD is filed with licensed killers/survivors from franchises as well as original killers/survivors. Basicly its a a 1v4 Killer v Survivor game. Ive had hours of fun playing this game both on steam and ps4. If you are even the slightest horror fan I highly recommend this game. There are tons of perks and characters to choose from to enter the fog.
